title: webinars
content:
Evidence Webinars | AmeriCorps An official website of the United States government Here’s how you know Official websites use .gov A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States. Secure .gov websites use HTTPS A lock ( Lock A locked padlock ) or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive
              information only on official, secure websites. Evidence Exchange Evidence Webinars The Evidence Webinar series, hosted by AmeriCorps' Office of Research and Evaluation, explores approaches and evidence-based practices to help partners boost the impact of their work. To hear the latest, join us live, or view our collection of past events. Subscribe for our latest publications and insights on national service, social innovation, volunteering, and civic engagement. SUBSCRIBE DOWNLOAD THE PDF Taking the Pulse of Our Nation’s Civic Health—and Taking Action for Civic Renewal November 19, 2024 Recovery Coaching for Substance Use Disorders:  Evidence from a Recent AmeriCorps Evaluation and Capacity Building Project September 26, 2024 Snapshots in Service: AmeriCorps and Workforce Development June 13, 2024 Putting Civic Engagement in Context: Exploring Data Trends, Uses, and Actionable Insights April 4, 2024 Evidence Innovation: How AmeriCorps Investments are Addressing the Opioid Crisis February 29, 2024 AmeriCorps ROI Studies – Proof that the Cost of ‘Doing Good’ Benefits the Personal, Community and Federal Bottomline December 14, 2023 Delivering on Diversity and Equity with Data October 31, 2023 Results Driven Service: The 2023 State of the Evidence on AmeriCorps’ Impact September 28, 2023 Double Trouble: Reigniting Civic Engagement through Pandemics and Disasters June 22, 2023 Leveraging Transformative Resources to Meet Community Needs and Ignite a Lifetime of Civic Engagement June 8, 2023 Community-Based Research as a Vehicle for Civic Engagement and Community Impact April 26, 2023 What is Civic Engagement?
